ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: The LORD your God will raise up for you a prophet like me... I will put my words in his mouth...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: People... began to say, “Surely this is the Prophet...” For I did not speak on my own, but the Father who sent me commanded me to say all that I have spoken.]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: I have installed my king on Zion, my holy mountain.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: Nathanael declared, “Rabbi, you are the Son of God; you are the king of Israel.” ... Jesus answered, “You say that I am a king... the reason I was born... is to testify to the truth.”]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: ...your lips have been anointed with grace...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: All spoke well of him and were amazed at the gracious words that came from his lips.]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: I will open my mouth with a parable; I will utter hidden things...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: Jesus spoke all these things to the crowd in parables... So was fulfilled... “I will open my mouth in parables...”]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: The LORD has sworn... “You are a priest forever, in the order of Melchizedek.”]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: God said to him, ... “You are a priest forever, in the order of Melchizedek.” ... For it is declared: “You are a priest forever, in the order of Melchizedek.”]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: ...Galilee of the nations... The people walking in darkness have seen a great light...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ...lived in Capernaum... Galilee of the Gentiles— the people living in darkness have seen a great light...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: The Spirit of the LORD will rest on him— the Spirit of wisdom and of understanding, the Spirit of counsel and of might...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ...he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove and alighting on him... And the child grew and became strong; he was filled with wisdom... And Jesus grew in wisdom...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: Then will the eyes of the blind be opened and the ears of the deaf unstopped. Then will the lame leap like a deer, and the mute tongue shout for joy.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: Jesus replied... report... The blind receive sight, the lame walk, ...the deaf hear... At that very time Jesus cured many... gave sight to many who were blind... ‘The blind receive sight, the lame walk... the deaf hear...’]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: A voice of one calling: “In the wilderness prepare the way for the LORD...”]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: John the Baptist came, preaching... This is he who was spoken of... “A voice of one calling in the wilderness, ‘Prepare the way for the Lord...’” ...the voice of one crying in the wilderness: ‘Prepare the way of the Lord...’]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: Here is my servant... I will put my Spirit on him... He will not shout... A bruised reed he will not break...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: Aware of this, Jesus withdrew... This was to fulfill... “Here is my servant... I will put my Spirit on him... He will not quarrel or cry out... A bruised reed he will not break...”]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: ...to open eyes that are blind, to free captives from prison and to release from the dungeon those who sit in darkness.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ...recovery of sight for the blind, to set the oppressed free... ...to open their eyes and turn them from darkness to light, and from the power of Satan to God...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: See, I have made him a witness to the peoples, a ruler and commander of the peoples.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: Jesus answered, “You say that I am a king. In fact, the reason I was born and came into the world is to testify to the truth.”]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me... anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor... to proclaim the year of the LORD’s favor...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: “The Spirit of the Lord is on me, because he has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor... to proclaim the year of the Lord’s favor.”... “Today this scripture is fulfilled...”]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: Seventy ‘sevens’ are decreed... to bring in everlasting righteousness...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ...so also one righteous act resulted in justification and life for all people... Christ Jesus, who has become for us... our righteousness...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: ‘Here is the man whose name is the Branch... And he will be a priest on his throne...']
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: We do have such a high priest, who sat down at the right hand of the throne... He has become a high priest forever, in the order of Melchizedek.]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: See, your king comes to you, righteous and victorious, lowly and riding on a donkey...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: This took place to fulfill... “Say to Daughter Zion, ‘See, your king comes to you, gentle and riding on a donkey...’”... “Hosanna to the Son of David!”...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: “I will send my messenger, who will prepare the way before me. Then suddenly the Lord you are seeking will come to his temple...”]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: as it is written... “I will send my messenger ahead of you, who will prepare your way”... Jesus entered the temple courts and drove out all who were buying and selling there.]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: See, I will send the prophet Elijah to you before that great and dreadful day of the LORD comes...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: And if you are willing to accept it, he [John the Baptist] is the Elijah who was to come... And he will go on before the Lord, in the spirit and power of Elijah...]
